description:
The legendary Expedition Booties have been reimagined in Gore’s highly breathable and totally windproof Infinium Windstopper. Multiple layers of cozy Primaloft insulation wrap your feet and ankles, helping you feel recharged and ready to get after it again tomorrow. At the end of hard day out on ice, snow or rock, these booties are as welcome as a hot drink and a soft seat. Grippy bottoms and water-resistant-breathable shells keep you sure-footed and dry if you need to cross snow on the way to the outhouse.

  • GORE‑TEX INFINIUM™ WINDSTOPPER® shell material is windproof, water resistant, and ultra breathable
  • Unsealed seams mean the booties are highly water-resistant, but not fully waterproof
  • Primaloft Gold series recycled synthetic insulation, that’s known for an incredible warmth to weight ratio, breathability and pack-ability
  • Soft, brushed polyester insole linings add comfort
  • DWR finish inside and out resists light rain and helps keeps your booties cleaner, longer
  • Toggled instep drawcords allow a custom fit and banish heat-robbing voids
  • Toggled top drawcords keep extension cuffs up and debris out
  • Wrap-around rands for added abrasion resistance
  • Anti-slip soles reduce pratfalls
  • Height to top of insulation is 22cm. To top of extension cuffs is an additional 30cm above the insulation
name: MEC Expedition Gore-Tex Booties - Unisex
